title: Commentary on JPB, JVk,JPg Plus A Little Lex Fridman
description: A Commentary on the Big Convo! A little late. Again, looking at it through my Pirsig influenced lens, focusing more on evolutionary levels that other concepts, because I think it clears up some of the moral conundrums faced by this power trio. Namely, how morality is the nature of reality. Again, not a MoQ expert...always working through on my own terms...so I hope it's not too boring or wrong from the MoQ perspective!
